title: Wirefly Hive

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - During the day, choose a player to swarm.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- At the beginning of the night after you swarm a player, grant them Basic defense for the night. Then, flip a coin. If you win the flip, increase your attack value by two stages for the night (it starts at None), and increase your target's defense by one stage, and if you lose the flip, set your attack value back to None. Then, you may attack your target, which resolves immediately. If you don't, repeat this process.
- You may repeat your process as many times you have time in the night, but you can't "flip the coin up to a googolplex times until I win 80 flips in a row and can kill my target". You have to manually go through every flip with the host.
- You can increase your attack value and your target's defense value indefinitely (They become something like Overoverover...overoverkill).
- You can pretty much give up once your target's at Overoveroverprotective and you're back at None.

fields.name: Attributes (cont.):
fields.value:
- Once you're done flipping, or when the night ends, your target will learn that they were swarmed by a 674: Wirefly Hive and the exact sequences of wins and losses you got.
- You have a Basic autovest.

desc:
Post 674
*The lifespan of a wirefly can be precisely described as 'short.'*
